name: Bancor
intro: Decentralized on-chain Automated Market Maker (AMM) network
introduce: Bancor is a decentralized network of on-chain automated market makers (AMMs) supporting instant, low-cost trading, as well as Single-Sided Staking and 100% Impermanent Loss Protection for any listed token. Bancor was the first DEX to use an AMM to facilitate swaps between Ethereum-based tokens, and was designed to create permissionless token trading markets for a burgeoning token economy.
